page.title: 10The Crichton Cup
page.content: Every year in March the Crichtons are held at Newtown. Lots of boys from Newtown,Melrose,Darnick,Gattonside and St.Boswells take part in the Crichton Cup. The games are played at Melrose, St.Boswells and Newtown. If you get beaten in the final you receive a silver medal. If you win the final you receive a gold medal and a trophy. You also receive a cup for the team. There are a number of different age-groups,and they all receive different cups. It is an enjoyable event even if you get beaten.
